bibl.title: Collecting Fragments. Fragmente sammeln. (Aporemata. Kritische Studien zur Philologiegeschichte. 1.)
bibl.note: The 17 contributions presented here were originated partly in a symposium held in Heidelberg in 1995. - Pp. v-viii: Glenn W. MOST, Preface - Pp. 329-338: Indices.
MOST Glenn W. (Ed.), Collecting Fragments. Fragmente sammeln. (Aporemata. Kritische Studien zur Philologiegeschichte. 1.)
Göttingen, Vandenhoeck & Ruprecht, 1997, 8°, x-338 pp. ISBN 3-525-25900-X. DM 98.
